.class public auto ansi sealed Conversion extends System.Object

summary.span: 模块包含用于执行各种转换操作的过程。

span.span: The module contains the procedures used to perform various conversion operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此模块支持 Visual Basic 语言关键字和运行库成员，这些关键字将十进制数字转换为其他基项、将数字转换为字符串，将字符串转换为数字，将一种数据类型转换为另一种数据类型。This module supports the Visual Basic language keywords and run-time library members that convert decimal numbers to other bases, numbers to strings, strings to numbers, and one data type to another. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Hex` 函数返回数字的十六进制值。This example uses the `Hex` function to return the hexadecimal value of a number. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

related.span: Visual Basic 运行时库成员

Public Function CTypeDynamic (Expression As Object, TargetType As Type) As Object

static member CTypeDynamic : obj * Type -> obj
.method public static object CTypeDynamic(object Expression, class System.Type TargetType) cil managed

param.name: TargetType
param.span: 该对象要转换为的类型。

span.span: The type to which to convert the object.

summary.span: 将对象转换为指定类型。

span.span: Converts an object to the specified type.

returns.span: 一个对象，其类型在运行时为请求的目标类型。

span.span: An object whose type at run time is the requested target type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CTypeDynamic` 方法将作为 `Expression` 参数传递的对象转换为 `TargetType` 参数指定的类型。The `CTypeDynamic` method converts the object passed as the `Expression` parameter to the type specified by the `TargetType` parameter. 如果对象是动态对象，则 `CTypeDynamic` 方法会应用可用的动态转换。If the object is a dynamic object, the `CTypeDynamic` method applies available dynamic conversions. `CTypeDynamic` 方法根据对象本身定义的转换语义应用动态转换。The `CTypeDynamic` method applies dynamic conversions in accordance with the conversion semantics defined by the object itself. 如果动态对象从 继承，则 `CTypeDynamic` 方法首先尝试使用用户定义的静态转换执行转换。If a dynamic object inherits from , the `CTypeDynamic` method first attempts to perform the conversion by using a user-defined, static conversion. 如果用户定义的静态转换失败，`CTypeDynamic` 方法将尝试使用动态转换执行转换。If the user-defined, static conversion fails, the `CTypeDynamic` method attempts to perform the conversion by using dynamic conversions. 如果动态对象实现 ，则 `CTypeDynamic` 方法优先于用户定义的静态转换的动态转换。If a dynamic object implements , the `CTypeDynamic` method gives precedence to dynamic conversions over user-defined, static conversions. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `CTypeDynamic` 方法，通过使用由动态对象定义的转换，将动态对象转换为字符串。The following example uses the `CTypeDynamic` method to convert a dynamic object to a string by using the conversion defined by the dynamic object. ```vb Imports System.Dynamic Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim dyn As Object = New SampleDynamicObject Dim sampleString = CTypeDynamic(dyn, GetType(String)) Console.WriteLine(sampleString) End Sub End Module Class SampleDynamicObject Inherits DynamicObject Public Overrides Function TryConvert(ByVal binder As ConvertBinder, ByRef result As Object) As Boolean If binder.Type = GetType(String) Then result = "Sample String" Return True End If Return False End Function End Class ```

span.span: An object statically typed as the requested generic type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CTypeDynamic` 方法将作为 `Expression` 参数传递的对象转换为泛型参数的类型所指定的类型。The `CTypeDynamic` method converts the object passed as the `Expression` parameter to the type specified by the type of the generic parameter. 如果对象是动态对象，则 `CTypeDynamic` 方法会应用可用的动态转换。If the object is a dynamic object, the `CTypeDynamic` method applies available dynamic conversions. `CTypeDynamic` 方法根据对象本身定义的转换语义应用动态转换。The `CTypeDynamic` method applies dynamic conversions in accordance with the conversion semantics defined by the object itself. 如果动态对象从 继承，则 `CTypeDynamic` 方法首先尝试使用用户定义的静态转换执行转换。If a dynamic object inherits from , the `CTypeDynamic` method first attempts to perform the conversion by using a user-defined, static conversion. 如果用户定义的静态转换失败，`CTypeDynamic` 方法将尝试使用动态转换执行转换。If the user-defined, static conversion fails, the `CTypeDynamic` method attempts to perform the conversion by using dynamic conversions. 如果动态对象实现 ，则 `CTypeDynamic` 方法优先于用户定义的静态转换的动态转换。If a dynamic object implements , the `CTypeDynamic` method gives precedence to dynamic conversions over user-defined, static conversions. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `CTypeDynamic` 方法，通过使用由动态对象定义的转换，将动态对象转换为字符串。The following example uses the `CTypeDynamic` method to convert a dynamic object to a string by using the conversion defined by the dynamic object. ```vb Imports System.Dynamic Module Module1 Sub Main() Dim dyn As Object = New SampleDynamicObject Dim str = CTypeDynamic(Of String)(dyn) Console.WriteLine(str) End Sub End Module Class SampleDynamicObject Inherits DynamicObject Public Overrides Function TryConvert(ByVal binder As ConvertBinder, ByRef result As Object) As Boolean If binder.Type = GetType(String) Then result = "Sample String" Return True End If Return False End Function End Class ```

summary.span: 返回与给定的错误号对应的错误信息。

span.span: Returns the error message that corresponds to a given error number.

returns.span: 对应于最新运行时错误的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that corresponds to the most recent run-time error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ErrorToString` 函数检查 `Err` 对象的属性设置以确定最新的运行时错误。The `ErrorToString` function examines the property settings of the `Err` object to identify the most recent run-time error. `ErrorToString` 函数的返回值对应于 `Err` 对象的 `Description` 属性。The return value of the `ErrorToString` function corresponds to the `Description` property of the `Err` object. 如果未发生运行时错误，`ErrorToString` 将返回一个长度为零的字符串（""）。If no run-time error has occurred, `ErrorToString` returns a zero-length string (""). 在 Visual Basic 版本6.0 及更早版本中，此功能由 `Error` 函数提供。In Visual Basic version 6.0 and earlier, this functionality was provided by the `Error` function. ## Examples 下面的代码使用 `ErrorToString` 函数显示与指定错误号对应的错误消息。The following code uses the `ErrorToString` function to display error messages that correspond to the specified error numbers. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#4)]

span.span: Returns the error message that corresponds to a given error number.

returns.span: 与给定错误号对应的错误消息。

span.span: The error message that corresponds to a given error number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ErrorToString` 函数检查 `Err` 对象的属性设置以确定最新的运行时错误。The `ErrorToString` function examines the property settings of the `Err` object to identify the most recent run-time error. `ErrorToString` 函数的返回值对应于 `Err` 对象的 `Description` 属性。The return value of the `ErrorToString` function corresponds to the `Description` property of the `Err` object. 如果 `ErrorNumber` 是有效的错误号，但未定义，则 `ErrorToString` 返回字符串 `"Application-defined or object-defined error."` 如果 `ErrorNumber` 无效，则会发生错误。If `ErrorNumber` is a valid error number but is not defined, `ErrorToString` returns the string `"Application-defined or object-defined error."` If `ErrorNumber` is not valid, an error occurs. 如果省略 `ErrorNumber`，则返回与最新的运行时错误相对应的消息。If `ErrorNumber` is omitted, the message corresponding to the most recent run-time error is returned. 如果未发生运行时错误或 `ErrorNumber` 为0，则 `ErrorToString` 返回一个长度为零的字符串（""）。If no run-time error has occurred or `ErrorNumber` is 0, `ErrorToString` returns a zero-length string (""). 在 Visual Basic 版本6.0 及更早版本中，此功能由 `Error` 函数提供。In Visual Basic version 6.0 and earlier, this functionality was provided by the `Error` function. ## Examples 下面的代码使用 `ErrorToString` 函数显示与指定错误号对应的错误消息。The following code uses the `ErrorToString` function to display error messages that correspond to the specified error numbers. [!code-vb[VbVbalrCatRef#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrCatRef/VB/Class1.vb#4)]

param.name: Number
param.span: 类型的数字或任何有效的数值表达式。

span.span: A number of type or any valid numeric expression.

summary.span: 返回一个数的整数部分。

span.span: Returns the integer portion of a number.

returns.span: 数字的整数部分。

span.span: The integer portion of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数都删除 `Number` 的小数部分，并返回生成的整数值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数之间的区别在于，如果 `Number` 为负，则 `Int` 返回小于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数，而 `Fix` 返回大于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如，`Int` 将-8.4 转换为-9，将 `Fix` 8.4 转换为-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` ## Examples 此示例说明 `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数如何返回数字的整数部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 对于负数参数，`Int` 函数将返回小于或等于数字的第一个负整数;`Fix` 函数返回大于或等于数字的第一个负整数。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求你指定 `Option Strict Off`，因为不允许在 `Option Strict On`下从类型 `Double` 到类型 `Integer` 的隐式转换：The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用 `CInt` 函数将其他数据类型显式转换为 `Option Strict Off``Integer` 类型。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但 `CInt` 会舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以对 `Fix` 或 `Int` 调用的结果使用 `CInt` 函数，以便在不进行舍入的情况下显式转换为整数。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关 `CInt`的详细信息，请参阅[类型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions).

returns.span: 数字的整数部分。

span.span: The integer portion of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数都删除 `Number` 的小数部分，并返回生成的整数值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数之间的区别在于，如果 `Number` 为负，则 `Int` 返回小于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数，而 `Fix` 返回大于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如，`Int` 将-8.4 转换为-9，将 `Fix` 8.4 转换为-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` 从 Visual Basic 15.8 开始，如果将由 `Fix` 方法返回的值传递到任何[整型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/conversion-functions)，或者 `Fix` 返回的 `Double` 值将隐式转换[为设置为 `Off`的整数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-strict-statement)，则 `Double`到整数转换的性能将得到优化。Starting with Visual Basic 15.8, the performance of `Double`-to-integer conversion is optimized if you pass the value returned by the `Fix` method to the any of the [integral conversion functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/conversion-functions), or if the `Double` value returned by `Fix` is implicitly converted to an integer with [Option Strict](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-strict-statement) set to `Off`. 此优化使代码可以更快运行 -- 对于进行大量到整型类型的转换的代码，可快达两倍。This optimization allows code to run faster -- up to twice as fast for code that does a large number of conversions to integer types. 下面的示例演示了此类经过优化的转换：The following example illustrates such an optimized conversion: ```vb Dim d As Double = 173.7619 Dim i1 As Integer = CInt(Fix(d)) ' Result: 173 ``` ## Examples 此示例说明 `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数如何返回数字的整数部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 对于负数参数，`Int` 函数将返回小于或等于数字的第一个负整数;`Fix` 函数返回大于或等于数字的第一个负整数。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求你指定 `Option Strict Off`，因为不允许在 `Option Strict On`下从类型 `Double` 到类型 `Integer` 的隐式转换：The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用 `CInt` 函数将其他数据类型显式转换为 `Option Strict Off``Integer` 类型。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但 `CInt` 会舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以对 `Fix` 或 `Int` 调用的结果使用 `CInt` 函数，以便在不进行舍入的情况下显式转换为整数。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关 `CInt`的详细信息，请参阅[类型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数都删除 `Number` 的小数部分，并返回生成的整数值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数之间的区别在于，如果 `Number` 为负，则 `Int` 返回小于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数，而 `Fix` 返回大于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如，`Int` 将-8.4 转换为-9，将 `Fix` 8.4 转换为-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` ## Examples 此示例说明 `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数如何返回数字的整数部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 对于负数参数，`Int` 函数将返回小于或等于数字的第一个负整数;`Fix` 函数返回大于或等于数字的第一个负整数。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求你指定 `Option Strict Off`，因为不允许在 `Option Strict On`下从类型 `Double` 到类型 `Integer` 的隐式转换：The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用 `CInt` 函数将其他数据类型显式转换为 `Option Strict Off``Integer` 类型。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但 `CInt` 会舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以对 `Fix` 或 `Int` 调用的结果使用 `CInt` 函数，以便在不进行舍入的情况下显式转换为整数。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关 `CInt`的详细信息，请参阅[类型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions).

span.span: The integer portion of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数都删除 `Number` 的小数部分，并返回生成的整数值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数之间的区别在于，如果 `Number` 为负，则 `Int` 返回小于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数，而 `Fix` 返回大于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如，`Int` 将-8.4 转换为-9，将 `Fix` 8.4 转换为-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` 从 Visual Basic 15.8 开始，如果 `Number` 参数是一个对象，该对象的运行时类型为 `Double` 或 `Single`，则在将由 `Fix` 方法返回的值传递到任何[整型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/conversion-functions)时，或者如果 `Fix` 返回的值被自动转换为整数，并将[选项 Strict](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-strict-statement)设置为 Off，则将优化浮点到整数转换的性能。Starting with Visual Basic 15.8, if the `Number` argument is an object whose runtime type is `Double` or `Single`, the performance of floating-point-to-integer conversion is optimized if you pass the value returned by the `Fix` method to the any of the [integral conversion functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/conversion-functions), or if the value returned by `Fix` is automatically converted to an integer with [Option Strict](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-strict-statement) set to Off. 此优化使代码可以更快运行 -- 对于进行大量到整型类型的转换的代码，可快达两倍。This optimization allows code to run faster -- up to twice as fast for code that does a large number of conversions to integer types. 例如：For example: ```vb Dim d As Object = 173.7619 Dim i1 As Integer = CInt(Fix(d)) ' Result: 173 Dim s As Object = 173.7619F Dim i2 As Integer = CInt(Fix(s)) ' Result: 173 ``` ## Examples 此示例说明 `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数如何返回数字的整数部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 对于负数参数，`Int` 函数将返回小于或等于数字的第一个负整数;`Fix` 函数返回大于或等于数字的第一个负整数。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求你指定 `Option Strict Off`，因为不允许在 `Option Strict On`下从类型 `Double` 到类型 `Integer` 的隐式转换：The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用 `CInt` 函数将其他数据类型显式转换为 `Option Strict Off``Integer` 类型。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但 `CInt` 会舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以对 `Fix` 或 `Int` 调用的结果使用 `CInt` 函数，以便在不进行舍入的情况下显式转换为整数。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关 `CInt`的详细信息，请参阅[类型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `Number` 不是整数，则在计算之前，它将舍入为最接近的整数值。If `Number` is not already a whole number, it is rounded to the nearest whole number before being evaluated. |如果 `Number` 为If `Number` is|Hex 返回Hex returns| |-|-| |空Empty|零Zero (0)| |任何数值Any numeric value|最多十六个十六进制字符Up to sixteen hexadecimal characters| 您可以使用 `&H`在适当范围内的数字前面直接表示十六进制数字。You can represent hexadecimal numbers directly by preceding numbers in the proper range with `&H`. 例如，`&H10` 表示十六进制表示法中的十进制数16。For example, `&H10` represents decimal 16 in hexadecimal notation. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Hex` 函数返回数字的十六进制值。This example uses the `Hex` function to return the hexadecimal value of a number. param.name: Number
param.span: 类型的数字或任何有效的数值表达式。

span.span: A number of type or any valid numeric expression.

summary.span: 返回一个数的整数部分。

span.span: Returns the integer portion of a number.

returns.span: 数字的整数部分。

span.span: The integer portion of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数都删除 `Number` 的小数部分，并返回生成的整数值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数之间的区别在于，如果 `Number` 为负，则 `Int` 返回小于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数，而 `Fix` 返回大于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如，`Int` 将-8.4 转换为-9，将 `Fix` 8.4 转换为-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` ## Examples 此示例说明 `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数如何返回数字的整数部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 对于负数参数，`Int` 函数将返回小于或等于数字的第一个负整数;`Fix` 函数返回大于或等于数字的第一个负整数。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求你指定 `Option Strict Off`，因为不允许在 `Option Strict On`下从类型 `Double` 到类型 `Integer` 的隐式转换：The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用 `CInt` 函数将其他数据类型显式转换为 `Option Strict Off``Integer` 类型。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但 `CInt` 会舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以对 `Fix` 或 `Int` 调用的结果使用 `CInt` 函数，以便在不进行舍入的情况下显式转换为整数。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关 `CInt`的详细信息，请参阅[类型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions).

param.name: Number
param.span: 类型的数字或任何有效的数值表达式。

span.span: A number of type or any valid numeric expression.

summary.span: 返回一个数的整数部分。

span.span: Returns the integer portion of a number.

returns.span: 数字的整数部分。

span.span: The integer portion of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数都删除 `Number` 的小数部分，并返回生成的整数值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数之间的区别在于，如果 `Number` 为负，则 `Int` 返回小于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数，而 `Fix` 返回大于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如，`Int` 将-8.4 转换为-9，将 `Fix` 8.4 转换为-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` 从 Visual Basic 15.8 开始，如果将 `Int` 方法返回的值传递到任何[整型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/conversion-functions)，或者如果 `Int` 返回的双精度值被设置为 Off，则将优化双精度转换的性能，如果返回的双精度[值将自动](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-strict-statement)转换为整数。Starting with Visual Basic 15.8, the performance of Double-to-integer conversion is optimized if you pass the value returned by the `Int` method to the any of the [integral conversion functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/conversion-functions), or if the Double value returned by `Int` is automatically converted to an integer with [Option Strict](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-strict-statement) set to Off. 此优化使代码可以更快运行 -- 对于进行大量到整型类型的转换的代码，可快达两倍。This optimization allows code to run faster -- up to twice as fast for code that does a large number of conversions to integer types. 下面的示例演示了此类经过优化的转换：The following example illustrates such an optimized conversion: ```vb Dim dbl As Double = 175.7619 Dim i3 As Integer = CInt(Int(dbl)) ' Result: 175 ``` ## Examples 此示例说明 `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数如何返回数字的整数部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 对于负数参数，`Int` 函数将返回小于或等于数字的第一个负整数;`Fix` 函数返回大于或等于数字的第一个负整数。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求你指定 `Option Strict Off`，因为不允许在 `Option Strict On`下从类型 `Double` 到类型 `Integer` 的隐式转换：The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用 `CInt` 函数将其他数据类型显式转换为 `Option Strict Off``Integer` 类型。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但 `CInt` 会舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以对 `Fix` 或 `Int` 调用的结果使用 `CInt` 函数，以便在不进行舍入的情况下显式转换为整数。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关 `CInt`的详细信息，请参阅[类型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions).

the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求你指定 `Option Strict Off`，因为不允许在 `Option Strict On`下从类型 `Double` 到类型 `Integer` 的隐式转换：The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用 `CInt` 函数将其他数据类型显式转换为 `Option Strict Off``Integer` 类型。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但 `CInt` 会舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以对 `Fix` 或 `Int` 调用的结果使用 `CInt` 函数，以便在不进行舍入的情况下显式转换为整数。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关 `CInt`的详细信息，请参阅[类型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions).

span.span: The integer portion of a number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数都删除 `Number` 的小数部分，并返回生成的整数值。Both the `Int` and `Fix` functions remove the fractional part of `Number` and return the resulting integer value. `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数之间的区别在于，如果 `Number` 为负，则 `Int` 返回小于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数，而 `Fix` 返回大于或等于 `Number`的第一个负整数。The difference between `Int` and `Fix` functions is that if `Number` is negative, `Int` returns the first negative integer less than or equal to `Number`, whereas `Fix` returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to `Number`. 例如，`Int` 将-8.4 转换为-9，将 `Fix` 8.4 转换为-8。For example, `Int` converts -8.4 to -9, and `Fix` converts -8.4 to -8. `Fix(number)` 等效于 `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).``Fix(number)` is equivalent to `Sign(number) * Int(Abs(number)).` 从 Visual Basic 15.8 开始，如果 `Number` 参数是一个对象，该对象的运行时类型为 `Double` 或 `Single`，则在将由 `Int` 方法返回的值传递到任何[整型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/conversion-functions)时，或者如果 `Int` 返回的值被自动转换为整数，并将[选项 Strict](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-strict-statement)设置为 Off，则将优化浮点到整数转换的性能。Starting with Visual Basic 15.8, if the `Number` argument is an object whose runtime type is `Double` or `Single`, the performance of floating-point-to-integer conversion is optimized if you pass the value returned by the `Int` method to the any of the [integral conversion functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/conversion-functions), or if the value returned by `Int` is automatically converted to an integer with [Option Strict](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-strict-statement) set to Off. 此优化使代码可以更快运行 -- 对于进行大量到整型类型的转换的代码，可快达两倍。This optimization allows code to run faster -- up to twice as fast for code that does a large number of conversions to integer types. 例如：For example: ```vb Dim d As Object = 173.7619 Dim i1 As Integer = CInt(Int(d)) ' Result: 173 Dim s As Object = 173.7619F Dim i2 As Integer = CInt(Int(s)) ' Result: 173 ``` ## Examples 此示例说明 `Int` 和 `Fix` 函数如何返回数字的整数部分。This example illustrates how the `Int` and `Fix` functions return integer portions of numbers. 对于负数参数，`Int` 函数将返回小于或等于数字的第一个负整数;`Fix` 函数返回大于或等于数字的第一个负整数。In the case of a negative number argument, the `Int` function returns the first negative integer less than or equal to the number; the `Fix` function returns the first negative integer greater than or equal to the number. 下面的示例要求你指定 `Option Strict Off`，因为不允许在 `Option Strict On`下从类型 `Double` 到类型 `Integer` 的隐式转换：The following example requires you to specify `Option Strict Off` because implicit conversions from type `Double` to type `Integer` are not allowed under `Option Strict On`: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class2.vb#4)] 您可以使用 `CInt` 函数将其他数据类型显式转换为 `Option Strict Off``Integer` 类型。You can use the `CInt` function to explicitly convert other data types to type `Integer` with `Option Strict Off`. 但 `CInt` 会舍入为最接近的整数，而不是截断数字的小数部分。However, `CInt` rounds to the nearest integer instead of truncating the fractional part of numbers. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 您可以对 `Fix` 或 `Int` 调用的结果使用 `CInt` 函数，以便在不进行舍入的情况下显式转换为整数。You can use the `CInt` function on the result of a call to `Fix` or `Int` to perform explicit conversion to integer without rounding. 例如：For example: [!code-vb[VbVbalrMath#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMath/VB/Class1.vb#6)] 有关 `CInt`的详细信息，请参阅[类型转换函数](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions)。For more information on `CInt`, see [Type Conversion Functions](/dotnet/visual-basic/language-reference/functions/type-conversion-functions).

summary.span: 返回数字的 表示形式。

returns.span: 数字的 表示形式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当数字转换为字符串时，将始终为 `Number`的符号保留前导空格。When numbers are converted to strings, a leading space is always reserved for the sign of `Number`. 如果 `Number` 为正，则返回的字符串将包含前导空格，并暗含正负号。If `Number` is positive, the returned string contains a leading space, and the plus sign is implied. 负数将包括负号（-），无前导空格。A negative number will include the minus sign (-) and no leading space. 使用 `Format` 函数可以将您要设置格式的数字值转换为日期、时间、货币或其他用户定义格式。Use the `Format` function to convert numeric values you want formatted as dates, times, or currency or in other user-defined formats. 与 `Str` 函数不同，`Format` 函数不包括前导空格用于 `Number`的符号。Unlike the `Str` function, the `Format` function does not include a leading space for the sign of `Number`. > [!NOTE] > `Str` 函数仅将句点（`.`）识别为有效的小数点分隔符。The `Str` function recognizes only the period (`.`) as a valid decimal separator. 如果使用不同的小数分隔符（例如，在国际应用程序中），请使用 `CStr` 或 `Format` 函数将数字转换为字符串。If different decimal separators are used (for example, in international applications), use the `CStr` or `Format` functions to convert a number to a string. 若要获取特定区域性中的数字的字符串表示形式，请使用该数字的 `ToString(IFormatProvider)` 方法。To get the string representation of a number in a particular culture, use the number's `ToString(IFormatProvider)` method. 例如，将 `Double` 类型的值转换为字符串时，请使用 。For example, use when converting a value of type `Double` to a string. ## Examples 此示例使用 `Str` 函数返回数字的 `String` 表示形式。This example uses the `Str` function to return a `String` representation of a number. 当正数转换为字符串时，将始终为其符号保留前导空格。When a positive number is converted to a string, a leading space is always reserved for its sign. [!code-vb[VbVbalrStrings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrStrings/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

span.span: The numbers contained in a string as a numeric value of appropriate type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Val` 函数在其无法识别为数字一部分的第一个字符处停止读取字符串。The `Val` function stops reading the string at the first character it cannot recognize as part of a number. 不识别经常被视为数值部分的符号和字符，如美元符号和逗号。Symbols and characters that are often considered parts of numeric values, such as dollar signs and commas, are not recognized. 但是，该函数识别基数前缀 `&O` （对于八进制）和 `&H` （十六进制）。However, the function recognizes the radix prefixes `&O` (for octal) and `&H` (for hexadecimal). 从参数中去除空格、制表符和换行符。Blanks, tabs, and linefeed characters are stripped from the argument. 以下调用返回值1615198。The following call returns the value 1615198. ```vb Val(" 1615 198th Street N.E.")  ``` 以下调用返回十进制值-1。The following call returns the decimal value -1. ```vb Val("&HFFFF")  ``` > [!NOTE] > `Val` 函数仅将句点（`.`）识别为有效的小数点分隔符。The `Val` function recognizes only the period (`.`) as a valid decimal separator. 当使用不同的小数点分隔符时，与在国际应用程序中一样，请改用 `CDbl` 或 `CInt` 来将字符串转换为数字。When different decimal separators are used, as in international applications, use `CDbl` or `CInt` instead to convert a string to a number. 若要将特定区域性中的数字的字符串表示形式转换为数值，请使用数值类型的 `Parse(String, IFormatProvider)` 方法。To convert the string representation of a number in a particular culture to a numeric value, use the numeric type's `Parse(String, IFormatProvider)` method. 例如，在将字符串转换为 `Double`时，使用 。For example, use when converting a string to a `Double`. 为了响应某些不常见的数字格式，可能会引发 异常。An exception might be thrown in response to certain uncommon number formats. 例如，下面的代码引发此异常。For example, the following code raises this exception. ```vb ' These examples cause run-time errors. Console.WriteLine(Val("1.34%")) Console.WriteLine(Val("1.34&")) ``` 如果格式不包含在字符串中，则编译器将捕获格式化为 `Double` 的数字与 `Integer` 和 `Long` 类型字符之间的冲突。The conflict between the number formatted as a `Double` and the `Integer` and `Long` type characters would be caught by the compiler if it were not contained in a string. ```vb ' These examples cause compiler errors. Dim m = 1.34% Dim n = 1.34& ``` ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `Val` 函数返回每个字符串中包含的数字。The following example uses the `Val` function to return the numbers contained in each string. `Val` 在无法解释为数字、数字修饰符、数字标点或空格的第一个字符处停止转换。`Val` stops converting at the first character that cannot be interpreted as a numeric digit, numeric modifier, numeric punctuation, or white space. [!code-vb[VbVbalrFunctions#54](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrFunctions/VB/Class1.vb#54)]

以下调用返回值1234123。The following call returns the value 1234123. ```vb Val(" 1234 123th Street N.E.")  ``` 以下调用返回十进制值-1。The following call returns the decimal value -1. ```vb Val("&HFFFF")  ``` > [!NOTE] 类型字符之间的冲突。The conflict between the number formatted as a `Double` and the `Integer` and `Long` type characters would be caught by the compiler if the conflict were not contained in strings. > > `' These examples cause compiler errors.` > > `'Dim m = 1.34%` > > `'Dim n = 1.34&` ## Examples 下面的示例使用 `Val` 函数返回每个字符串中包含的数字。The following example uses the `Val` function to return the numbers contained
